B

BiocaseCrawlConfiguration - Class in org.gbif.crawler.protocol.biocase
Holds information necessary to crawl a BioCASe resource:

target URL content namespace (only ABCD 1.2 and 2.06 are supported) dataset title

This object is immutable.

DigirCrawlConfiguration - Class in org.gbif.crawler.protocol.digir
Holds information necessary to crawl a DiGIR resource:

target URL resource code a flag indicating if this is a MANIS endpoint

This object is immutable.
